hero.title: Meridian Console Scope
hero.subtitle: Modern game server hosting platform
hero.description: Meridian Console is a full-stack control plane with distributed agents and a unified web console for managing game servers at scale.

highlights.title: Clear Product Vision
highlights.description: Unified control plane, distributed agents, and a Blazor-based management console.

highlights.title: Composable Architecture
highlights.description: 12 control plane services with dedicated infrastructure for observability, messaging, and data.

highlights.title: Phased Delivery
highlights.description: Six phases, 54 milestones, and explicit success criteria to track execution.

sections.title: Mission
sections.markdown: Meridian Console delivers a premium, developer-focused game server hosting experience with real-time visibility, strong security, and rapid provisioning.

sections.title: How to use this scope
sections.description: Navigate by section to explore the full product plan.
sections.markdown: Use the navigation drawer to explore Overview, Architecture, Roadmap, and Governance. Each section captures the authoritative plan for product delivery.
